content.question: Which of the following factors is most important for the team to consider before drawing conclusions from the data?

choices.label: The survey data are considered reliable because the survey used self-reported responses from students.
The survey results may not represent all high school students because only those with Internet access and interest in the topic participated.
The survey ensures accuracy because students were able to choose whether or not to participate.
The method of survey collection does not matter as long as there are a large number of responses in the data set.

content.answer: The survey results may not represent all high school students because only those with Internet access and interest in the topic participated.

topic.text: 4.1: Ethical and Social Issues Around Data Collection

skill.text: 5.A: Explain how computing impacts society, economy, and culture.
